name: CarY Drift Racing Offline
description:
***WARNING: YOU WILL START BACKWARDS, just turn the car around to face the city environment.***

Welcome to my 100% original game. Here are some reviews:

"It's great" -some random guy in a CarX VC when I streamed it to the VC. 

"Probably has better physics than CarX" -another random guy in the VC.

"That is just awesome" -My Game Design teacher watching me over my shoulder.

"This should be game of the year" -Me
